nl: Let $X$ be a topological space and let $Y$ be a metric space. Let $f_{n}: X \rightarrow Y$ be a sequence of continuous functions. Let $x_{n}$ be a sequence of points of $X$ converging to $x$. Show that if the sequence $\left(f_{n}\right)$ converges uniformly to $f$, then $\left(f_{n}\left(x_{n}\right)\right)$ converges to $f(x)$.
